title: Bonus: We need to talk about Below Deck Down Under
content:encoded:
Last week, Below Deck Down Under was rocked by a serious incident on board that made headlines around the world. In this bonus episode, Duncan Greive and Alex Casey discuss what happened, how the production reacted, and what it says about how far both reality TV and society has come.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes.author: The Spinoff
itunes.subtitle: Alex Casey and Duncan Greive discuss the intense scenes that unfolded after a drunken night on season two of Below Deck Down Under.
